resources.string: Welcome to your Shoe Store, we are glad that you have created an account with us, and are delighted to serve you and help you manage your shoe inventory.
There are a couple of actions you can perform with your shoe store at the moment:

View: the home screen is a view showing the list of shoes you currently have in your store.\nAdd: to the bottom right of the list screen, you see an + button that takes you to form where you can add new shoes.\nEdit: on the home screen, you can click on any shoe in the list, to take you to a form where you can edit the shoe\'s information.
